actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses its Frightful Presence then one Bite and two Claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 17 (2d10+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: All it picks within 120' and aware of it frightened 1 min (DC 16 Wis negates) Can re-save at end of each of its turns. Save/effect ends: immune 24 hrs.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Uses one of the following:Light Beam. Emits beam of white light in a 90' line that is 5 ft. wide. Each creature in line: 45 (10d8) radiant (DC 19 Dex half).Rainbow Blast. Emits multicolored light in 60' cone. Each creature in area: 36 (8d8) damage (DC 19 Dex half). Dragon splits damage among acid cold fire lightning or poison choosing a number of d8s for each type totaling 8d8. Must choose at least two types.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Int (DC 17) no material components: At will: charm person color spray dancing lights3/day: prismatic spray1/day: prismatic wall

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Wings (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 20': DC 16 Wis save or take 11 (2d10) radiant and blinded until start of its next turn.
